above todo items for arbitrary quick notes
time tracking effort estimation project planning (taskjuggler)

topic.note: :PROPERTIES: :Effort: 01:00 :END: or :Effort: 5d DEADLINE: <2020-12-24> CLOSED: <2020-12-24> :LOGBOOK: clock time http://www.personal.psu.edu/bam49/notebook/org-mode-for-research/ taskjuggler https://orgmode.org/worg/org-tutorials/org-taskjuggler.html http://taskjuggler.org/tj3/manual/Installation.html :resource_id: bsp * mytask :PROPERTIES: :ORDERED: t :BLOCKER: previous-sibling or task_id :priority: 1000 :allocate: dev :END: :task_id: beta *** Peter Murphy :PROPERTIES: :resource_id: doc :limits: { dailymax 6.4h } :END:

topic.text: create pages when number of\Ntoplevel nodes exceeds 20
allow freeform layout when all\Nnodes have positions
move info nodes to info main node

sum sub/child efforts and\Nadd to subtree header
use rollup checkboxes\Nwhen item has subitems

text.note: keep smmx layout of unchanged nodes

topic.text: or: to md, merge,\Nback to smmx
info node note to child hierarchy
not when parent node uses\Nlist or top-down layout
